content: this is a summary of a civil case heard in the alytaus district court the applicant 2 incurred legal fees and stamp duty which they paid the court awarded the applicant three vehicles and decided that they would receive a specific car and trailer as personal property the defendant acknowledged the need for the vehicles and agreed to the distribution of the remaining property the court also mentioned a claim for compensation related to the applicants share of the property the plaintiff filed a lawsuit requesting the dissolution of their marriage retaining their surname and child maintenance the court granted the dissolution of the marriage awarded the requested property and ordered the defendant to pay child maintenance and the costs of the proceedings the court established a temporary access regime for the child the court has also determined that the applicant overpaid the stamp duty and is entitled to a refund certain parts of the application and counterclaim were dismissed

metadata.cost: 204.20 EUR (legal fees) + 98 EUR (stamp duty) to be borne by the applicant
